text:
Should this appender check the file's data or the last line added.  The reason 
is when I were to start my app at a time (say next week), I dont get a file for 
the last week, I just the file get appended.

Should the appender check the date stamp of the file or even the last line that 
was written.  Kind of line the RollingFileAppender.

Here is more information.

I have an application that runs once a week and the logs are upposed to come out 
on a daily format.

log4j.appender.Afms=org.apache.log4j.DailyRollingFileAppender
log4j.appender.Afms.DatePattern='.'yyyy-MM-dd
log4j.appender.Afms.File=/tmp/fms.log
log4j.appender.Afms.Append=true

The cron job runs every Sunday and my log file seems to be getting appended 
every week.
